hints.content:
Each tick mark represents one minute.

Dina started washing her car at $\greenD{3{:}37}$  and finished at $\redD{4{:}10}$.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 3:30 to 4:15  with tick marks every 1 unit. A point labeled 3:37 appears at 7 tick marks after 3:30, and a point labeled 4:10 appears 10 ticks marks after 4:00. !

hints.content:
To find out how many minutes Dina washed her car, we can find the distance from $\greenD{3{:}37}$ to $\redD{4{:}10}$. 

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
\greenD{3{:}37} +{} &\purpleD{3}\text{ minutes} = 3{:}40\\\\
3{:}40 +{} & \goldE{20}\text{ minutes} = 4{:}00 \\\\
4{:}00 +{}&\blueD{10}\text{ minutes} = \redD{4{:}10}\\\\
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 3:30 to 4:15 with tick marks every 1 unit. A series of three arrows are shown moving left to right from the 3:37 tick mark to the 4:10 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 3:37 tick mark and ends at the 3:40 tick mark and is labeled plus 3. The second arrow starts at the 3:40 tick mark and ends at the 4:00 tick mark and is labeled plus 20. The third arrow starts at the 4:00 tick mark and ends at the 4:10 tick mark and is labeled plus 10. !

hints.content: Dina washed her car for $33$ minutes.

question.content:
The number line shows when Dina $\greenD{\text{starts}}$ and $\redD{\text{finishes}}$ washing her car.

[[☃ image 1]]

**How long did Dina wash her car?**  

[[☃ input-number 5]] minutes

options.alt: A number line labeled 3:30 to 4:15  with tick marks every 1 unit. A point labeled start appears at 7 tick marks after 3:30, and a point labeled finish appears 10 ticks marks after 4:00. !
